# Class CustomExecutionContextRegistry

Registry mapping execution IDs to their associated DataStore.

##### Index

### Methods

clearAll dispose get getOrCreate init

## Methods

### clearAll

  * clearAll(): void

Clears all stores.

#### Returns void




### dispose

  * dispose(executionId: string): boolean

Disposes and removes the store for an execution ID. Returns true if a store existed.

#### Parameters

    * executionId: string

#### Returns boolean




### get

  * get(executionId: string): [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)

Returns an existing store for the execution ID, or undefined.

#### Parameters

    * executionId: string

#### Returns [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)




### getOrCreate

  * getOrCreate(executionId: string): [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)

Returns the store for the execution ID, creating it if missing.

#### Parameters

    * executionId: string

#### Returns [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)




### init

  * init(executionId: string): [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)

Initializes a fresh store for the execution ID, replacing any existing one.

#### Parameters

    * executionId: string

#### Returns [DataStore](./graph_nodes_custom_custom_context_datastore.DataStore)




### Settings

Member Visibility

  * Protected
  * Inherited
  * External
